articles.title: How This Indian-Origin Man Reversed Type 2 Diabetes, What Experts Say About Weight Loss, Eating Habits - News18
articles.description: Ravi Chandra says he started running after he was diagnosed with type 2 diabetes. He uses maximum aerobic function technique, which involves running at a low-intensity aerobic heart rate. Experts say diabetes can be reversed within the first six years of diag…
articles.content:
Can you reverse diabetes without medicines? Well, a 51-year-old India-origin man claims to have done it with just running.
